item.title: Intern .NET Web Application Developer (oakland downtown)
item.description:
Medrio is an innovative medical software company based in the Bay Area. We provide our customers with a web-based software product (software as a service) that is revolutionizing clinical data management. Our client list includes industry leaders in the pharmaceutical and biotechnology sectors, as well as leading academic research centers.

Medrio is seeking a developer intern to join our development team during this summer with the potential for continued part-time employment during the school year. This position provides an excellent opportunity to work on cutting edge web development technologies in an agile environment. In this position you will work with other developers to implement new features and maintain Medrios Electronic Data Capture (EDC) application.

Job responsibilities include:
 Implement functionality in Medrios EDC application in accordance to our standards and operating procedures
 Develop unit tests using NUnit
 Create and maintain technical documentation such as design and testing plans
 Participate in team meetings

Essential Skills:
 Experience with either C# (preferred), VB.NET, Java or C++
 Experience with SQL
 Familiarity with HTML/CSS/Javascript
 Solid understanding of object oriented design and concepts
 Willingness to learn and ability to learn quickly
 Excellent problem solving skills and attention to detail

Experience with or knowledge of any of the following would be a major plus:
 Web Application Development
 ASP.NET / Ajax
 Hibernate / Nhibernate
 Junit / Nunit
 Visual Studio 2008
 SQL Server 2005
 Agile Development (SCRUM)
 Clinical Research

This position is located at Medrios offices in Oakland, CA. Please send resumes to techjobs@medrio.com .
